entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who catches a small object in mid-air.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, which drops a letter onto Harry's seat and begins to zoom around the compartment.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Ron's cat, who sits up in his seat and follows the owl with his great yellow eyes.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who notices Crookshanks following the owl and snatches it out of harm's way.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is excited when she hears that the letter is from Sirius.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: The sender of the letter, whose identity is revealed to Harry and his friends.

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig, as evidenced by the fact that he catches her in mid-air.
Ron owns Crookshanks, as evidenced by the fact that he sits up in his seat and follows the owl with his great yellow eyes.
Harry corresponds with Sirius, as evidenced by the letter addressed to him.
